00016 /**
00017  * Creates a queue
00018  */
00019 queue *queue_create(void) {
00020 
00021         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "queue_create: BEGIN");
00022 
00023         // if this malloc fails,
00024         //  there are much bigger problems that loom
00025         pthread_mutex_t *mutex = malloc( sizeof(pthread_mutex_t) );
00026         queue *q = malloc( sizeof(queue) );
00027         if ((NULL != q) && (NULL!=mutex)){
00028 
00029                 q->head  = NULL;
00030                 q->tail  = NULL;
00031 
00032                 pthread_mutex_init( mutex, NULL );
00033                 q->mutex = mutex;
00034         }
00035 
00036         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "queue_create: END");
00037         return q;
00038 }// init
00039 
00040 /**
00041  * Safely destroys a queue
00042  */
00043 void queue_destroy(queue *q) {
00044 
00045         if (NULL!=q)
00046                 free(q);
00047 }
00048 
00049 /**
00050  * Queues a message in the communication queue
00051  *
00052  * Returns 1 on success, 0 on error
00053  */
00054 int queue_put(queue *q, void *msg) {
00055 
00056         int code = 1;
00057         queue_node *tmp=NULL;
00058 
00059         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_put: BEGIN");
00060 
00061         pthread_mutex_lock( q->mutex );
00062 
00063                 // if this malloc fails,
00064                 //  there are much bigger problems that loom
00065                 tmp = (queue_node *) malloc(sizeof(queue_node));
00066                 if (NULL==tmp) {
00067 
00068                         tmp->msg = msg;
00069 
00070                         //perform the ''put'' operation {
00071                                 //no next yet...
00072                                 tmp->next=NULL;
00073 
00074                                 //insert pointer to element first
00075                                 if (NULL!=q->tail)
00076                                         (q->tail)->next=tmp;
00077 
00078                                 // insert element
00079                                 q->tail = tmp;
00080 
00081                                 //was the queue empty?
00082                                 if (NULL==q->head)
00083                                         q->head=tmp;
00084                         //}
00085                 } else {
00086                         code = 0;
00087                 }
00088         pthread_mutex_unlock( q->mutex );
00089 
00090         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_put: END");
00091 
00092         return code;
00093 }//[/queue_put]

00096 /**
00097  * Queues a message (non-blocking)
00098  *  in the communication queue
00099  *
00100  * Returns      1 on success,
00101  *                      0 on error
00102  *                      -1 on busy
00103  */
00104 int queue_put_nb(queue *q, void *msg) {
00105 
00106         queue_node *tmp=NULL;
00107         int code = 0;
00108 
00109         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_put_nb: BEGIN");
00110 
00111         code = pthread_mutex_trylock( q->mutex );
00112         if (EBUSY)
00113                 return -1;
00114 
00115                 // if this malloc fails,
00116                 //  there are much bigger problems that loom
00117                 tmp = (queue_node *) malloc(sizeof(queue_node));
00118                 if (NULL!=tmp) {
00119 
00120                         tmp->msg = msg;
00121 
00122                         //perform the ''put'' operation {
00123                                 //no next yet...
00124                                 tmp->next=NULL;
00125 
00126                                 //insert pointer to element first
00127                                 if (NULL!=q->tail)
00128                                         (q->tail)->next=tmp;
00129 
00130                                 // insert element
00131                                 q->tail = tmp;
00132 
00133                                 //was the queue empty?
00134                                 if (NULL==q->head)
00135                                         q->head=tmp;
00136                         //}
00137 
00138                 } else {
00139                         code = 0;
00140                 }
00141 
00142         pthread_mutex_unlock( q->mutex );
00143 
00144         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_put_nb: END");
00145 
00146         return 1;
00147 }//[/queue_put]

00149 /**
00150  * Retrieves the next message from the communication queue
00151  * Returns NULL if none.
00152  */
00153 void *queue_get(queue *q) {
00154 
00155         queue_node *tmp = NULL;
00156         void *msg=NULL;
00157 
00158         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_get: BEGIN");
00159 
00160         pthread_mutex_lock( q->mutex );
00161 
00162                 tmp = q->head;
00163                 if (tmp!=NULL) {
00164                         q->head = q->head->next;
00165                         msg = tmp->msg;
00166                         free(tmp);
00167                         doLog(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_get: MESSAGE PRESENT");
00168                 }
00169 
00170         pthread_mutex_unlock( q->mutex );
00171 
00172         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_get: END");
00173 
00174         return msg;
00175 }//[/queue_get]
00176 
00177 /**
00178  * Returns NULL if NONE / BUSY
00179  */
00180 void *queue_get_nb(queue *q) {
00181 
00182         //DEBUG_LOG_PTR(q, LOG_ERR, "queue_get_nb: NULL");
00183 
00184         queue_node *tmp = NULL;
00185         void *msg=NULL;
00186 
00187         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_get_nb: BEGIN");
00188 
00189         int code = pthread_mutex_trylock( q->mutex );
00190         if (EBUSY==code) {
00191                 //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_get_nb: BUSY");
00192                 return NULL;
00193         }
00194 
00195                 tmp = q->head;
00196                 if (tmp!=NULL) {
00197                         q->head = q->head->next;
00198                         msg = tmp->msg;
00199                         free(tmp);
00200                         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_get_nb: MESSAGE PRESENT");
00201                 }
00202 
00203         pthread_mutex_unlock( q->mutex );
00204 
00205         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_get_nb: END");
00206 
00207         return msg;
00208 }//[/queue_get]

00210 /**
00211  * Verifies if a message is present
00212  *
00213  * Returns 1 if at least 1 message is present
00214  */
00215 int queue_peek(queue *q) {
00216 
00217         queue_node *tmp = NULL;
00218         int result = 0;
00219 
00220         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_peek: BEGIN");
00221 
00222         pthread_mutex_lock( q->mutex );
00223 
00224                 tmp = q->head;
00225                 result = (tmp!=NULL);
00226 
00227         pthread_mutex_unlock( q->mutex );
00228 
00229         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queue_peek: END");
00230 
00231         return result;
00232 } // queue_peek
